# vjsim

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of vjsim is to simulate a simple vertical jump model with the aim of providing an educational tool used to understand elementary biomechanical concepts and jump profiles used in sport science. 

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/mladenjovanovic/vjsim) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mladenjovanovic/vjsim")
```

## Usage

Please read accompanying vignette for examples and usage of the vjsim

``` r
vignette("understanding-vjsim")
```
